objective: Senior Frontend Engineer with 10+ years experience building modern, feature rich web applications. I have experience as a team lead and individual contributor and am comfortable with both roles. I have a passion for coding and would love to work somewhere that allows me to continue to grow.

I’ve led multiple projects from concept to release and know the challenges involved with building large scale web applications. I’m a self starter and pride myself and the ability to quickly contribute.

positions.title: Frontend Team Lead
tasks: Led effort to build new Plays.tv client (video capture software) using ES6, Electron and React
HTML5 video editor allowing video clipping, bookmarks and automatic highlight reels
Rebuilt our video component to improve performance and reduce initial buffering delay by 50%
Built our UI component library using React and SASS
Led team of 4 engineers. Responsible for career development, performance tracking and conflict resolution when needed.

positions.title: Frontend Team Lead
tasks: Built our in house web framework including a module loader with dependency injector, reactive data bindings and a unique server implementation to stream page content quickly and efficiently.
Built a custom analytics tracker for click and mouse tracking, A/B testing and performance tracking
Supervised and mentored new hires as well as kept our documentation and setup guides up to date

positions.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
tasks: Created majority of pages on http://plays.tv and http://raptr.com
Lead a project to convert a 50k line JavaScript package from YUI to jQuery
Worked closely with product and design to bring business needs together with a clean workable UX

positions.title: Technical Yahoo
tasks: Frontend engineer on http://games.yahoo.com , the #1 (at the time) online games portal with millions of unique visitors
Worked on converting landing and signup pages to Yahoos new web framework (Maple and YUI)
Frontend engineer on http://videos.yahoo.com

positions.title: Frontend Engineer
tasks: Worked on cross-browser support and 508 compliance for QualysGuard
Created wireframes and mockups for new features and prototypes
Solved long standing issue with viewing large vulnerability reports on IE7 (ask me about this it was a fun bug to track down)

positions.title: Software Engineer
tasks: Lead Engineer on www.mdsuite.com. An early example of a SASS medical billing suite still used today
Utilized vbscript, dhtml, htc’s and Microsoft.XMLHTTP to create a responsive ajax webapp using IE5
Mentored new hires and held monthly classes on .NET for other engineers
